text: Karine Danielyan (; 9 June 1947 â€“ 4 April 2022) was an Armenian environmentalist and politician. She was Minister of Nature and Environment Protection from 1991 to 1994. She was born in Yerevan, Armenia. Danielyan died on 4 April 2022, in Yerevan at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Armenian politicians Category:Environmentalists Category:People from Yerevan Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Karine Danielyan
